post.summary: Read Cached Atp Status and Quantity at Location level for multiple keys
post.description: Read Cached Atp Status and Quantity at Location level for multiple keys

parameters.name: considerGtin
parameters.description: If this value is TRUE then the calculation will also consider other product(s) related to the GTINs

message.description: Specifies the details of error message.
message.example: There are errors in following fields: orgId - must not be null or blank;

message.example: Internal Server Error - Error occurred while loading data from db.

atpStatus.description: Based on the current Availability and the Atp publish configuration this field represent the current atp status
